headline: AI Transforming the Machinery Industry Through Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become a defining force in the machinery and manufacturing sectors, reshaping how production systems are managed, optimized, and scaled. Among all digital transformation tools, the Manufacturing Execution System (MES) stands out as the central nervous system of modern manufacturing operations. When combined with AI, MES evolves from a process-monitoring tool into an intelligent decision-making engine that predic
